Oskovia

General Information

Demonym Oskovian
Flavor Text "Champions to our promised future."
Faction Color Green
Peoples Albian, Bordenese, Vulmier, Lusian, Noxuian
Class List Rifle, Grenadier, Engineer, Shotgun, Assault Engine

Overview

Oskovia is a nation in the continent of Pordier. Oskovia boasts a well-equipped army and is in conflict with Rostora and the disputed territory of Borden.

Gameplay

Oskovia has all available classes at its disposal. Oskovian engineers are capable of building pillboxes. Oskovia also has heavy artillery.

Modifiers

On the barren map, Oskovia has the following modifiers:

Empire +1 Starting score
Extirpation Force +400%
Priceless Prestige -75% Assault Engine base cost
-67% Shotgun cost
Rifle becomes Grenadier
Outnumbered -33% Player cap

Trivia

  • On the barren map, Oskovia's Grenadier class is removed, and Rifle is given grenades.
